#include <stdio.h>
#include <stdlib.h>

typedef unsigned long long ULL;

ULL gcd(ULL a,ULL b){
  ULL c;
  while(b>0) c=a%b, a=b, b=c;
  return a;
}

ULL bin(ULL n,ULL k){
	if(k>n)return 0;
  if(k> n - k ) 
     k = n - k; 

  ULL p,i,d;
  p=1;
 for(i=1;i<=k;i++){
    d=gcd(p,i);
    p/=d;
    p*=(n-i+1)/(i/d);
  }
  return p;
}

int main(){
  int TST;
  scanf("%d",&TST);
  while(TST--){
    ULL n,k,ans;
    scanf("%llu %llu",&n,&k);
    ans=bin(n,k);
    printf("%llu\n",ans);
  }
  return 0;
}
